Pricing: Standard plan: $2/week, $6/month, $60/year, $100/2 years, $140/3 years; Pro plan: $4/week, $10/month, $100/year, $160/2 years, $220/3 years;
Payment Information: Debit/Credit: MasterCard, Maestro, Discover, Visa; PayPal, BitCoin; Monero; Cash; Gift Code;
Other Devices: Routers: DD-WRT, OpenWRT, pfSense, Tomato, Asuswrt, OPNsense, Vilfo router; NAS: Synology, QNAP;
Server Locations: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Serbia, Singapore, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States;
Data Retained: Account creation data: ID number, creation timestamp, product, max devices; Upon purchasing a plan: payment ID, account ID, amount, currency, timestamp, transaction ID; Credit card data: payment ID, account ID, amount, currency, timestamp; Usage data: browser user-agent, language, screen resolution, referring website, IP address, cookies;
Payment Data: Credit card payment: payment ID, account ID, amount, currency, timestamp, credit card details;
Data Retention Timeline: Data is deleted 90 days after account termination
